Articles.Content: Has anyone else noticed that it's impossible to properly put wheels on the RoveMate rover body?
What do you mean? I can put them on just fine
To properly put wheels on it, you really need to be in the SPH.
Or disable angle snap. Or use the Editor Extensions mod.

Editor Extensions mod.

This. I just built a rover yesterday that's very compact yet extremely stable and reliable based around the RoveMate. It looks something like a Russian version of a solar-powered Curiosity.
